SERVICE AGREEMENT

This Service Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into as of January 15, 2024, by and between TechCorp Solutions Inc., a Delaware corporation ("Provider"), and Meridian Legal Holdings LLC, a New York limited liability company ("Client").

1. SERVICES
The Provider shall deliver cloud-based legal document management services as described in Exhibit A.

2. TERM
This Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and remain in force until December 31, 2026, unless terminated earlier pursuant to Section 8.

3. COMPENSATION
The Client shall pay the Provider a monthly fee of USD 25,000, due on the first business day of each calendar month. The total contract value shall not exceed USD 750,000 over the term.

4. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York.

5. CONFIDENTIALITY
Each party agrees to maintain the confidentiality of all proprietary information for a period of three (3) years following termination of this Agreement.

6. LIABILITY
The Provider's total aggregate liability under this Agreement shall not exceed the fees paid by the Client in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim.
